FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

How can I become a member?

Any graduate of JGEC can join by filling out the membership form and paying the annual membership fee.

What are the membership fees?

Annual membership is ₹500. Lifetime membership is ₹5000. Student members can join for free.

How do I update my contact information?

You can update your information by logging into the alumni portal or contacting us directly.

JG

JGEC Alumni

Pune Chapter

Connecting graduates of Jalpaiguri Government Engineering College, fostering lifelong relationships and professional growth.
